Reviews.Title: not available
Reviews.Author: fl hull
Reviews.Content: I wanted this camera but was not available. I was able to get the Kodak 14 mp camera & I am very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: gutzy
Reviews.Content: Took this camera on vacation overseas. It looked great and worked well, especially liked how it started up quickly.  However the zoom stopped working after a few days. Am now contacting the manf. Will update when i see how they handle this situation.
